page.title: 08BUDGE INDUS.-TANK MUSEUM.
page.content: BUDGE INDUSTRIES IS LOCATED ON THE WEST CARR ROAD INDUSTRIAL ESTATE ON THE OUTSKIRTS OF RETFORD.MISTER BUDGE IS INTERESTED IN THE ENGINEERING AND TECHNICAL ASPECTS OF HEAVY PLANT AND MACHINERY.ONE OF MISTER BUDGE'S MAIN INTERESTS AND HOBBY IS THE RECOVERY AND RESTORATION OF MILITARY VEHICLES AND ASSOCIATED HARDWARE.MISTER BUDGE'S COLLECTION IS HOUSED IN A LARGE WAREHOUSE NEXT TO THE RAILWAY LINE ON WEST CARR ROAD.TWELVE TANKS ARE STORED IN THIS WAREHOUSE AND A FURTHER FOUR AT BRIDON WIRE A LITTLE WAY DOWN THE ROAD.AT BRIDON WIRE SOME TWENTY FIVE TRUCKS AND OTHER ASSORTED MILITARY VEHICLES ARE ALSO STORED.INFORMATION ABOUT THE VEHICLES IS STORED ON COMPUTER DISK SO AS TO AFFORD EASY ACCESS.THE STARTING PROCEDURE FOR EACH OF THE VEHICLES IS ALSO RECORDED IN THIS WAY.
